summary: TAKATA RECALL.  I RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF THE SAFETY RECALL IN JULY 2016 REGARDING THE PASSENGER SIDE AIRBAG IN MY CAR.  THE LETTER INDICATED FOLLOW-UP FOR REPLACEMENT OF THIS AIRBAG WOULD BE SENT FROM FORD MOTOR COMPANY ONCE PARTS ARE AVAILABLE.  I RECOGNIZE THIS IS A MASSIVE RECALL, BUT IT IS NOW A YEAR LATER AND THERE HAS BEEN NO FURTHER FOLLOW-UP.  ARE REPLACEMENTS PARTS STILL UNAVAILABLE?  I CONTINUE TO NOT ALLOW PASSENGERS TO RIDE IN MY FRONT PASSENGER SEAT AND AM CONCERNED FOR MY OWN SAFETY AS WELL.  ANY INFORMATION IS APPRECIATED.
